meanings.sent1: The hackly rocks scraped my hands as I climbed.
meanings.sent2: The hackly texture of the wall made it difficult to paint smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The hackly surface of the potato chips made them extra crunchy.
meanings.sent4: The hackly edges of the broken glass glinted dangerously in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The hackly bark of the tree felt like tiny needles against my skin.

meanings.definition: Characterized by sharp, irregular points or edges
meanings.sent1: The hackly metal sheet cut through the fabric easily.
meanings.sent2: The hackly thorns on the bush made it hard to pass by.
meanings.sent3: The hackly edges of the paper gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent4: The hackly rocks along the path posed a challenge for hikers.
meanings.sent5: The hackly sound of the broken glass underfoot was unsettling.
